Metadata.CommitMsg:
feat: Update security.yml to enhanced Trivy Docker image scanning

- Change workflow name from 'Security Scan' to 'trivy'
- Add scheduled weekly scans (Wednesdays at 8:36 AM)
- Switch from filesystem scanning to Docker image scanning
- Use pinned Trivy action version for security
- Add proper permissions for security-events and actions
- Build Docker image with GitHub SHA tag for scanning
- Use SARIF template format for better GitHub Security integration
- Remove exit-code failure to prevent build interruptions
- Simplify to single scan approach (remove table format)
Metadata.Author: pab1it0 <pavel@cloudefined.com>
